#3) Write a Java Program to swap two numbers using the third variable.
 import java.util.Scanner;
 
public class SwapTwoNumbers {
 
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        // TODO Auto-generated method stub
        int x, y, temp;
        System.out.println("Enter x and y");
        Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);
        x = in.nextInt();
        y = in.nextInt();
        System.out.println("Before Swapping" + x + y);
        temp = x;
        x = y;
        y = temp;
        System.out.println("After Swapping" + x + y);
         
    }
 
}
Output:

Enter x and y
45
98
Before Swapping4598
After Swapping9845

#4) Write a Java Program to swap two numbers without using the third variable.

import java.util.Scanner;
  
class SwapTwoNumberWithoutThirdVariable
{
   public static void main(String args[])
   {
      int x, y;
      System.out.println("Enter x and y");
      Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);
  
      x = in.nextInt();
      y = in.nextInt();
  
      System.out.println("Before Swapping\nx = "+x+"\ny = "+y);
  
      x = x + y;
      y = x - y;
      x = x - y;
  
      System.out.println("After Swapping without third variable\nx = "+x+"\ny = "+y);
   }
}
Output:

Enter x and y
45
98
Before Swapping
x = 45
y = 98
After Swapping without a third variable
x = 98
y = 45




Revers string

 
import java.io.*;
import java.util.Scanner;
 
public class rstr
{
    public static void main (String[] args) 
	{
       
        String input= "Malyalam";
		String output= "";
       
	   for(int i=input.length()-1; i>=0; i--)
	   
			output=output + input.charAt(i);
	  System.out.println(output);
	   
	   
	}
}



Palindrom or not 

public class pal
{
    public static void main (String[] args) 
	{
       
        String input= "Malyalam";
		String output= "";
       
	   for(int i=input.length()-1; i>=0; i--)
	   
		{
		output=output + input.charAt(i);
	  System.out.println(output);
		}
		
		if(input.equals(output))
	   {
			System.out.println("String is palindrom");
	   }
	   else
	   {
				System.out.println("String is palindrom");
	   }
	}
}


Revwers a word in string

public class pal
{
    public static void main (String[] args) 
	{
       
        String str= "My name is sachin";
		String a[] = str.split(" ");
       
	   for(int i=0; i<a.length; i++)
	   
		{
			System.out.print(a[i] + " ");
		}
		
		System.out.println("");
	for(int i=a.length()-1; i>=0; i--)
		{
			System.out.print(a[i] + " ");
		}
